content.rendered:
Our courier service covers a wide range of requirements. We also operate a contracted pathology transport service and same day courier service that covers:

  • Sensitive materials
  • Confidential documents
  • Court files/Legal documents
  • Auto parts/Components
  • Raw materials
  • Finished goods
  • Artwork/Blueprints/Plans
  • GP collections
  • Inter hospital transport
  • Ad hoc pathology transport
  • Blood products transportation
  • Temperature controlled deliveries
  • Pharmaceuticals/Medicines
  • And much more

With our courier service, your delivery can be tracked online, with real time information before, during and after your delivery so you can feel confident in our service being delivered efficiently and on time whilst keeping you in the loop every step of the way.

Our drivers are highly reliable and are fully trained to exceed all expectations, which we feel is paramount to deliver outstanding customer service!

We offer an Exclusive Rush-Direct Service!

This includes immediate pick up and delivery by the nearest driver
1-2 hour; Available 24/7
